pullRequest.title: Issue 18530
pullRequest.bodyText:
New endpoint /api/v2/languages/{language}/i18n to get all the messages, for the path param you can pass the languageId or the languageCode + CountryCode.
If you want to get the messages for the default lang, just pass default
LanguageUtilTest was not added to the MainSuite when created, now that is added found that this test was failing getLanguageId_existing_base_expected_non_negative_lang_Test because another test creates the same languages. Fixing it by checking if the lang already exists before creating.

nodes.bodyText:
language shouldn't be a query parameter.
Pathing should be
v2/languages/{language}/i18n to get all the messages for a language

+    /**
+     * Gets all the Messages from the language passed.
+     *
+     * If no language is passed will use the default language.

+    public Response getAllMessages (
+            @Context final HttpServletRequest request,
+            @Context final HttpServletResponse response,

nodes.bodyText: start the class name with Uppercase
Issue found: Avoid unused imports such as 'javax.ws.rs.DefaultValue'
Issue found: JUnit 4 tests that execute tests should use the @Test annotation, JUnit 5 tests should use @Test, @RepeatedTest, @TestFactory, @TestTemplate or @ParameterizedTest
